name: Leaderboard Stack
description:
Get the highest high score by stacking scores on the leaderboard. 

This game was made for the GDevelop Weekend Jam 2.

The Theme was leaderboard!

https://itch.io/jam/gdevelop-weekend-jam-2

Instructions:

Tap Screen to drop score

Game Over If:

  Score misses the stack

  Stack falls over

  Score falls below high score 

Credits:

Jamie Carmichael
